title: Is Nuclear Power the Future?
sub_head: Students discuss atomic energy as gas prices rise and electrical prices soar.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss nuclear energy. Next week we’ll ask, “As March Madness rolls toward crowning a college-basketball champion, millions of dollars are being placed in legal sports bets. Is the mainstreaming of gambling a social problem? Should colleges and television networks resist the trend?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before March 29. The best responses will be published that night.
